hero.title: About
hero.subtitle: Your trusted partner in delivering delicious food with lightning-fast service

story.title: Our Story
story.para1: Founded in 2022, Foodie began with a simple mission: to connect food lovers with their favorite restaurants through fast, reliable delivery. What started as a small startup has grown into a trusted platform serving thousands of customers daily.
story.para2: We believe that great food should be accessible to everyone, anytime. Our team works tirelessly to ensure that every meal arrives hot, fresh, and on time.
story.para3: Finally...at Foodie we don't just deliver meals, we deliver happiness at a time üçΩÔ∏èüíõ

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To revolutionize food delivery by supporting local restaurants, and creating memorable dining experiences for customers.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: To become the most trusted and loved food delivery platform globally, setting new standards for quality, speed, and customer satisfaction.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: Quality, reliability, innovation, and customer-first approach guide everything we do. We're committed to excellence in every delivery.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Foodie?
whyChoose.subtitle: We're not just another food delivery service

fast.title: Lightning Fast
fast.description: Average delivery time of just 30 minutes. Hot food, guaranteed.

quality.title: Premium Quality
quality.description: Partner with only the best restaurants to ensure top-notch quality.

easy.title: Easy Ordering
easy.description: Simple, intuitive app and website for hassle-free ordering.

secure.title: Safe & Secure
secure.description: Contactless delivery and secure payment options for your safety.

prices.title: Best Prices
prices.description: Competitive pricing with exclusive deals and discounts.

support.title: 24/7 Support
support.description: Round-the-clock customer support for any queries or issues.

alex.text: Best food delivery service I've ever used! Fast, reliable, and the food always arrives hot. Highly recommend!
alex.author: Alex Kumar

priya.text: The customer service is exceptional. They went above and beyond to ensure my order was perfect. 5 stars!
priya.author: Priya Sharma

rahul.text: Amazing variety of restaurants and cuisines. The app is super easy to use. My go-to for all food cravings!
rahul.author: Rahul Patel

cta.title: Ready to Experience Foodie?
cta.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers and enjoy delicious food delivered to your doorstep
